reviews.text: Bottle. Clear, black, rocky head, tan foam, medium sweetness, medium bitterness, medium body, oily feel, average carbonation, & abrupt finish.
Tap. Cloudy, golden, frothy, white foam, light body, average carbonation, lightly bitter, light sweetness, & long finish,
Tap. Black, rocky head, tan foam, medium bitterness, light sweetness, medium body, oily feel, soft carbonation, & long finish.
